items.sentence: What activity do you spend most of your time doing?
I wonder whether Tom is free this afternoon or not.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he put his sunglasses.
Please wait for me at the entrance of the building.
Tom said some things about Mary that weren\'t true.
I wasn\'t aware that I wasn\'t supposed to do that.
Tom was afraid that no one would come to his party.
How did you know Tom was going to go fishing today?
How did you know that Tom was the one who did that?
I\'m not sure that Tom would let anybody help Mary.
